A boolean to control whether the filter includes files marked for Deletion or not.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.EventType
member.summary: Represents a sealed class for defining distinct event types such as Add, Update, and Delete. This class ensures that only predefined instances of event types can be used, providing type safety and preventing the creation of arbitrary states.

member.summary: Private constructor to prevent external instantiation. This ensures that only the static readonly instances above can be created.

The string name of the event type.

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification
member.summary: Represents a classification of files, providing metadata about the type of files and associated entities such as file details and file name parts.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the file classification. This property serves as the primary key for the entity.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file classification. This property represents the descriptive label for a specific classification and is often used to identify or categorize files within the database.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification.FileDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of file details associated with a specific file classification. This property establishes the relationship between the entity and multiple entities.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification.Celebrity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the file classification is considered a "Celebrity." This property is used to mark specific classifications with special significance.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification.IncludeInSearch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this classification should be included in search results. This property determines if files associated with this classification are considered searchable.

member.name: P:AStar.Dev.Infrastructure.FilesDb.Models.FileClassification.FileNameParts
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of file name parts associated with the file classification. This property represents the one-to-many relationship between a file classification and its constituent parts that define or describe its naming structure.
